description.english: It's hard to resist, isn't it?
Some things are hard to resist
It's probably full of nice pictures
Not the most romantic one. But it still feels good
A beautiful place where beautiful things happen
You can't keep hiding it forever
Maybe your "friend" has feelings for you?
He can smell communists from a mile away
This is something I do alone
This'll be more than a coffee...
As long as we're together... we can find a way through this
Do you want to try it again?
A business meeting, of course! Student Council business!
The most fun you can have is behind closed doors
Okay, big boy. You can look
You know what the right thing to do is
Let's hope that we don't deal with any toasters
It's important for the presidential campaign
Put your hand on her shoulder
Give her a hand with her clothes
Perhaps Silent1 is monitoring your communications after all
You're gonna take a big bite of the apple, huh?
Well... I mean... there are good things about freaks
Made from a special formulation of patented, non-toxic resin that glides like an airplane through any orifice!
I don't have any way to tell her my intentions...
Help her out with her album
Oh... yeah. That's economical. Only one bed to make
It's hard to get up... when you have someone in your arms like this
It's very clear she's been lonely way too long
Maybe it's not what I have to say... it's what I have to do
With RECENTLY at my fingertips... I could rule the world...
Life with Leah is bound to be tumultuous. It is not always going to be like this
She's like a coat I can't stop wearing
Haley is just... such an easy going person...
She's still got some of that shyness to her...
Maybe... this is it. Maybe this is someone I can be happy with, wherever we end up
I'll wait for her. I've waited for a long time already
For now... I'll head down the road on my own
...with picnics like these... I'll be a very happy man...
